meanings.definition: Action or behavior in accordance with prevailing social standards, attitudes, practices, etc.
meanings.sent1: Her conformity to the school dress code was evident in her choice of uniform every day.
meanings.sent2: The team's conformity to the coach's strategy led to their victory in the game.
meanings.sent3: In a world of colorful outfits, his conformity to wearing only black stood out.
meanings.sent4: The garden's conformity to symmetry and order resembled a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The strict conformity to safety regulations ensured a hazard-free environment.

meanings.definition: Agreement or compliance with standards, rules, or laws.
meanings.sent1: The company's conformity to the new regulations impressed the inspectors.
meanings.sent2: The student's conformity to the school rules earned him a good conduct award.
meanings.sent3: The cat's conformity to the 'no pets on the bed' rule lasted until the first thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The river's conformity to the curves of the valley was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The building's conformity to the architectural guidelines made it blend seamlessly with the surroundings.
